summary: REQ-29 is partially implemented by updating the Header and Home Hero to use a shared LOGO_PATH constant pointing at the uploaded JPG. REQ-28 is not evidenced because the actual JPG asset under frontend/public/assets/generated is not shown as added. The diff also does not provide enough evidence that all other previous logo references across the repo were removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the newly uploaded logo image file (SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp-1.jpg) under frontend/public/assets/generated as the single source-of-truth logo asset.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show the image file being added to frontend/public/assets/generated; only a TypeScript constant referencing the path was added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove references to any other logo image filenames currently used repo-wide, ensuring all TT/Tactic Transmit logos render from /assets/generated/SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp-1.jpg and no routes show broken images.
missing_requirements.reason: Only Header and HeroSection are shown updated; there is no evidence of repo-wide removal of old logo filename references or verification across all listed routes/pages.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new brand constants module (LOGO_PATH) as a centralized source-of-truth for the logo path.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks to add an image asset and update UI references; it does not explicitly request creation of a new constants file/module.
